amendment.description: Amendment makes technical changes to sections 3037(c) and 3038.
amendment.purpose: An amendment made in order pursuant to a special of today which is technical in nature.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Petri amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Petri.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Petri amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
